managingDesc: You can manage your cookie preferences at any time by clicking the button below.
statsIntro: This chart shows the types of cookies used on our website:
title: Cookie Settings
summaryText: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, personalize content and ads, and analyze our traffic. By clicking 'Accept All', you consent to our use of cookies.
privacyLink: For more information, please read our

necessary.title: Necessary
necessary.description: Essential cookies enable core functionality. The website cannot function properly without these cookies, and they can only be disabled by changing your browser preferences.

functional.title: Functional
functional.description: Functional cookies help perform certain functionalities like sharing the content of the website on social media platforms, collecting feedback, and other third-party features.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: Analytics cookies help us understand how visitors interact with the website, helping us improve the user experience and website functionality.
analytics.ga4Notice: Note: Google Analytics 4 remains active to provide essential website analytics and improve our service.

marketing.title: Marketing
marketing.description: Marketing cookies are used to track visitors across websites to display relevant advertisements that are engaging and valuable to the visitors.

error.acceptAll: Failed to accept all cookies. Please try again.
error.acceptNecessary: Failed to accept necessary cookies. Please try again.
error.savePreferences: Failed to save preferences. Please try again.
error.updateCategory: Failed to update category. Please try again.
